title: Launch of Wikipedia
description: Wikipedia goes live, becoming one of the largest free information sources in the world.

title: Facebook Founded
description: Mark Zuckerberg launches Facebook at Harvard University.

title: Beijing Olympics
description: China hosts the Summer Olympics with an extravagant opening ceremony.

title: Instagram Launched
description: A photo-sharing app called Instagram launches and quickly gains popularity.

title: World Cup in Brazil
description: Germany wins the FIFA World Cup after defeating Argentina in the final.

title: India Reaches Cricket World Cup Final
description: India delivers a dominant performance throughout the tournament but finishes as runners-up to Australia in the ICC Cricket World Cup.

title: SpaceX Launches First Crew to ISS
description: SpaceXâ€™s Crew Dragon becomes the first privately built spacecraft to carry astronauts to the International Space Station.

title: COVID-19 Pandemic
description: A global pandemic changes the world, affecting billions of lives.
